description: Dead Rising is a game about re-killing people and taking photos.

0.0.10.description: Updated location logic and fixed PP stickers that were mislabeled (Thanks Razgriz).
0.0.10.title: 0.0.10 Alpha Release

0.0.11.description:
Fixed missing location and added the ability to speed up in game time right from the start, which should make it so you can get some checks earlier without having to complete Backup for Brad or sit and wait for an hour.

Also began a full refactor.  Branches are still separate, but this release uses the new layout.  Please create an issue here or let me know on the Discord if there are any problem!
0.0.11.title: 0.0.11 Alpha Release

0.0.12.description:
Added a new GUI for spawning items, instead of adding them to a queue.  This should cut down on crashing.  

You can find the option to show the gui window under REFramework, Script Generated UI, then selecting Show AP Items Window.

New "Restricted Item Mode"!  Now you can set this option in the APworld so that when you are sent items from the server, this only allows you to pick them up in the world.  This mode also disables all items you havent been sent yet.  This is for more experienced players.  Make sure you generate a new template to take advantage of the new option.
0.0.12.title: 0.0.12 Alpha Release

0.0.2.description: Fixed some logic, so you shouldn't get stuck so early.  If you see you should get an item from the server and it doesnt come through, note the item name and let me know on Discord or by creating an issue.
0.0.2.title: 0.0.2 Alpha Release

0.0.3.description: Fixed item duping, cleaned up some logs.
0.0.3.title: 0.0.3 Alpha Release

0.0.4.description: Fixed some issues with checks not sending, keys not applying after reload, and time unlocks not working properly.
0.0.4.title: 0.0.4 Alpha Release

0.0.5.description: Fixed the vent sticker not sending, sped up survivor tracking to hopefully force it to send NPC checks faster.
0.0.5.title: 0.0.5 Alpha Release

0.0.6.description:
Added DeathLink!

Fixed time caps not working properly, added more logic to prevent locks, fixed Backup for Brad letting you into the Food Court early.

Please generate a new YAML Template before generating a world.
0.0.6.title: 0.0.6 Alpha Release

0.0.7.description: Fixed items not being sent if received while game was closed. Compatible with previous APworld.
0.0.7.title: 0.0.7 Alpha Release

0.0.8.description:
Added an option in AP_DRDR_main.lua to disable save redirect.  

A reminder that this is an Alpha release.  There are bugs.  If you experience any, please let me know on the AP After Dark Discord or by creating an issue here on GitHub.  Thanks!
0.0.8.title: 0.0.8 Alpha Release

0.0.9.description: Fixed the time cap not working at all, and resolved outdated call.
0.0.9.title: 0.0.9 Alpha Release

0.1.0.description:
## Ready for beta testing! 

This release brings a lot of stability, location and item fixes, and finally goal release!  

The mod and APWorld are not compatible with older versions, so please finish up any games you may have before updating.  And be sure to update both!

As always, thank you to everyone for testing!  Let me know if you have any issues!
0.1.0.title: 0.1.0 Beta Release

0.1.1.description:
Door Randomizer added!

Generate new YAML templates to see new options for DoorRandomizer!  Let me know if you run into any issues.
0.1.1.title: 0.1.1 Beta Release

0.1.2.description:
Bug fixes:
Fixed a bug causing keys sent to the player while in game to not unlock an area until the save was reloaded.
Logging should be far cleaner now.
Added debug options to stop time gates and area locks.
Added a "Redirect" checkbox in the Archipelago Connection window to allow you to change if your save is redirected to a custom slot or not.
0.1.2.title: 0.1.2 Beta Release
